text.section: The cabinet may promulgate administrative regulations to implement the provisions of this chapter.
The Department of Juvenile Justice may promulgate administrative regulations to implement the provisions of this chapter.
The cabinet and the department shall not promulgate administrative regulations under this chapter that conflict.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 18, effective July 1, 1987.
